sqlMap.select: select A.chatMemSeq, A.chatRoomSeq, A.memSeq, B.cDate, C.id as memId, C.name as memName from chatMemberList A, chatRoom B, member C where A.chatRoomSeq = B.chatRoomSeq AND A.memSeq = C.seq AND A.chatRoomSeq in (select chatRoomSeq from chatMemberList where memSeq = (select seq from member where id = #memId#) ) AND C.id != #memId#
select count(*) as cnt from chatMemberList where memSeq = #hostSeq# OR memSeq = #guestSeq# group by chatRoomSeq
select count(*) as cnt from chatMemberList A, member B where A.memSeq = B.seq AND A.chatRoomSeq = #chatRoomSeq# AND B.id = #memId#
select B.name as memName, A.chatLogSeq, A.chatMsg, A.chatLogTime as chatTime from chatLog A, member B where A.chatMemSeq = B.seq AND A.chatRoomSeq = #chatRoomSeq# order by chatLogTime asc
sqlMap.insert: insert into chatMemberList (chatMemSeq, chatRoomSeq, memSeq) values (#chatMemSeq#, #chatRoomSeq#, #memSeq#)
insert into chatLog (chatLogSeq, chatRoomSeq, chatMemSeq, chatMsg, chatLogTime) values (#chatLogSeq#, #chatRoomSeq#, #chatMemSeq#, #chatMsg#, SYSTIMESTAMP)
